column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I started with a Jinya Bun. It normally comes as pork belly
column4: and mayo stuffed in a bun. I took the cucumber out and had the mayo left off. It was good and the pork belly piece was spot on. I clearly did not agree with the set up of the bun
column5: hence my modifications. My other friend thought the cucumber was not a good addition to the bun and messed with the entire composition of it
column6: so he also removed the cucumber. I get they tried to add it to help the texture and crunchiness of the bun
column7: but it did not work well. They should've just put more lettuce to create the same effect without taking away from the entire bun.
